schema.name: HubspotAuditLogs_CL
schema.description: Activity history for user actions related to approvals, content updates, CRM object updates, security activity, and more.

columns.name: ActingUser
columns.description: An object containing the user's ID and email address.

columns.name: Id
columns.description: The unique ID of the action event.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp of when the action was performed.

columns.name: TargetObjectId
columns.description: The ID of the object that the user performed the action on.

schema.name: HubspotSecurityActivity_CL
schema.description: Logs of user actions related to security activity.

columns.name: ActingUser
columns.description: The email address of the user associated with the activity.

columns.name: CountryCode
columns.description: The country code of the location where the login was attempted.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp of when activity occurred.

columns.name: Id
columns.description: The unique ID of the login event.

columns.name: InfoUrl
columns.description: The URL of the page where the activity occurred.

columns.name: IpAddress
columns.description: The IP address used for the login attempt.

columns.name: Location
columns.description: The location where the login was attempted.

columns.name: ObjectId
columns.description: The ID of the object that the activity was performed on.

columns.name: RegionCode
columns.description: The region code of the location where the login was attempted.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: The ID of the user associated with the activity.
